description: All candidates must have a multicultural field experience to help develop their
competence in teaching in multicultural environments. A minimum of 80 hours of field
experience in a multicultural school environment (an Interim or its equivalent) is
required prior to student teaching.  All field experiences must be pre-approved. Below is
Teaching English as a Second Language; EDUC 378: Multicultural Education
in Hawaii; EDUC 379: Urban Education Seminar and Practicum; or pre-approved
internships in multicultural schools.  See Education
Department faculty and website for advice and information.  EDUC 382 is not a course.
Rather it is a recording mechanism indicating St. Olaf students who have completed their
multicultural education requirement. Students register for EDUC 382 during their
professional semester. P/N only. Offered each semester.
